summary: "Jeepers Creepers" is a 2001 American horror movie directed by Victor Salva. It's about a brother and sister on spring break who meet a scary truck driver. The movie is named after a popular 1938 song. It was made with help from Francis Ford Coppola and did well in theaters, making $59 million. Although critics had mixed reviews, the film led to two sequels and a reboot.
title: Jeepers Creepers (2001 film)
